explanations.CNN: Abbreviation for convolutional neural network, used in the model.
explanations.recurrent neural network: BiLSTM is a type of recurrent neural network used in the model.
explanations.long short-term memory: LSTM networks are discussed as part of the model's architecture.
explanations.LSTM: Abbreviation for long short-term memory, used in the model.
explanations.feature learning: The CNN component is used to extract features from time series data.
explanations.feature representation: The model aims to better represent and capture patterns in the data through feature extraction.
